Author: ifuckpineapples
Text: i tend to do this with excess food in my house as well, but i just c&s onto a paper plate instead, cover it with a paper towel, and then tie it up in plastic bag before trashing it. makes it less obvious.

Author: audreyhepburnwho
Text: Not forget that reason but yeah i prefer doing it over the sink and flushing it away because for skme reason it feels cleaner than doing it over a trash bag...
